title: Handkerchief, 1940s
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 71 x 76.5 cm (27 15/16 x 30 1/8 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Simeon Braguin
description: Printed on the border is "Bundles for Britian," with leaves and small flowers. The field has various shields and is printed in red and blue.  Brooke Cadwallader is printed in one corner.
